Title: Subarray Divisibility
Description: Given an array of n integers, your task is to count the number of subarrays where the sum of values is divisible by n.
Input Specification:
The first input line has an integer n: the size of the array. 
 The next line has n integers a_1,a_2,\dots,a_n: the contents of the array.
Output Specification: Print one integer: the required number of subarrays.
